title: Cherishing Destiny
description: Evolution is power. Mutation is weakness. The world is about to change and no one knows it.Alexander and Aurora Lake are Vampire elders with great power and influence. Vampires envy them, humans desire them, and they have prospered in a world where Vampires and humans live in harmony.Sara Walker is a young human woman who has worked for the Lakes since she was a teen. Her dark desires fuel her infatuation with the beautiful couple, but never did she dream that disaster would place her at the very center of their world.When the unthinkable happens and the earth is ravaged by a massive solar event along with the resultant geomagnetic storm, just surviving the aftermath becomes a struggle for them all.They seek safety in seclusion, but Saraâ€™s only family, a step-brother returns to ensure her safety and brings with him his own dark secret. Her beloved step-brother Ryan is a Were-wolf and his loyalties are torn between his human sister and his clan. As Sara becomes ever more entangled in lust and love with the seductive Vampires, Ryan must cope with the situation and learn to look past his bias to find that he can trust and love too.In support of each other, the four will face off against danger, hardship and their own kind to keep their blended family safe and inadvertently they find themselves central to the shape of the new world and a new age in evolution.Adult Content.
